https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ffyNPI0VuS0vdB2bX2vOrB0KL9h.jpg After turbulence with their respective baby mamas and ex-wives force them to take definitive action, the four guys sign up for Deadbeat Dad Rehab with Mr Leon to help them get their act together. Through all the hilarity, hi-jinks, drama and soul-searching, the guys discover that fatherhood is less about making babies, and more about becoming men. Bad Dad Rehab
